short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was created to help the British understand English (This extension was just made for fun)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If a website is not working it is most likely because of the extension, turn off the extension if the website is not working. A website blacklist option is going to be added later.

The extension was made just for fun and is just a joke and not supposed to be harmful or offensive to anyone just a bit of fun. This is the first extension I have ever made and uploaded so I welcome feedback.
